chart.title: Food: greenhouse gas emissions across the supply chain
chart.subtitle: [Greenhouse gas emissions](#dod:ghgemissions) are measured in kilograms of [carbon dioxide-equivalents (CO₂eq)](#dod:carbondioxideequivalents) per kilogram of food.

food_emissions_land_use.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
food_emissions_land_use.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Land use change” [dataset]. Poore, J., & Nemecek, T. (2018). Reducing food’s environmental impacts through producers and consumers. Science, 360(6392), 987-992. [original data].
